title: 20 minute waits for something Out of my control
body: Hey riot I just wanted to talk about how my game crashed in the middle of a loading screen and repaired, then my team remade the game that I got  kicked out of. And I finished the update and had 20 minute waits. These are a pain and I would ask if you can somehow let me off the hook. After all I didn't do anything wrong

replies.body: Even though the leave was not intentional, leaving still causes a negative experience for other players.  Leaverbuster will be placed on an account after multiple leaves and not just 1, so resolving whatever is causing the crash is important.  Let me know if this is still and issue and with more details.  I'll be happy to help!
